name: FlexiWrite Document
summary: Learn about .DFTI files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The DFTI file is the main file type associated with FlexiWrite. It is created when you save your document and can be closed and opened at a later time. FlexiWrite uses the document similarly to how Word uses the .DOCX and .DOC files.
FlexiWrite is available to download for free as a native application for Macs. A Java archive (.JAR) version is available for Windows.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.alt: Screenshot of a .dfti file in FlexiWrite
